Quiz_home_question: ready to take up the challenge?
Quiz_home_regle11: Welcome to MboaCulture, the quiz application that will put your knowledge of Mboa to the test! Here's how to play:
Quiz_home_regle21: Press the 'Play' button to start a new quiz.
Quiz_home_regle31: Each quiz consists of a series of multiple-choice questions. Select the answer you think is correct.
Quiz_home_regle41: You have a limited time to answer each question. Be quick to score more points!
Quiz_home_regle51: Your score depends on the speed and accuracy of your answers.
Quiz_home_regle61: The game ends after the last question. You can see your final score and try to beat it the next time you play!
